Module schiffeversenken
Package de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine

Class BufferedImageCanvas

java.lang.Object
de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.Canvas
de.uniluebeck.itm.schiffeversenken.engine.BufferedImageCanvas
public final class BufferedImageCanvas extends Canvas
This canvas is SWING/AWT compatible.
Author:
leondietrich
